sentences.en: Circle that can be resized proportionally by dragging any selection handle.
sentences.cn: 可通过拖动任一选择手柄,成比例调整其大小的圆形.

sentences.en: Corner bath. Can be resized proportionally.
sentences.cn: 方角浴缸. 可成比例地调整其大小.

sentences.en: Density of fire increases proportionally to the curiousness of the target.
sentences.cn: 你越是感到好奇的目标就越危险.

sentences.en: Here hop is already proportionally added and the whole is heated up, possibly until boiling temperature.
sentences.cn: 此时已经适量添加酒花,并加热麦汁暂存罐中的麦汁, 可能要让其达到煮沸温度.

sentences.en: However, because of on-chip space limitations, the TLB size can not be increased proportionally.
sentences.cn: 然而，由于芯片空间的限制，TLB 的大小不能成比例地增加。

sentences.en: I love my face, it lets my five senses proportionally distributed.
sentences.cn: 我爱我的脸, 它让我的五官比例完美地分布.

sentences.en: It is proportionally added in the filtration batchwise.
sentences.cn: 热渣以适当的比例加到分批过滤中.

sentences.en: Proportionally to her income she spends far more on holidays than I do.
sentences.cn: 她在度假上比我花的钱多得多,这和她的收入是成比例的.

sentences.en: So a woman's take - home pay will always be proportionally less.
sentences.cn: 因此一位妇女的实得工资将总是相应地(比男人)少一些.

sentences.en: The Letter of Guarantee shall be decreased proportionally with the Seller's partial deliveries.
sentences.cn: 保函金额应随卖方货物的分批交付而按比例递减.

sentences.en: The Naphtha Stipper Reboiler duty is not decreased proportionally to the laden methanol to be stripped.
sentences.cn: 石脑油汽提塔再沸器的负荷不是与被汽提的富甲醇按比例减少.

sentences.en: Therefore the demands on crisis managers are rising too proportionally with the intricacy of the situation.
sentences.cn: 因此,对危机管理的需求也不断上升,比例随着形势错综复杂.

sentences.en: This is still a Bermuda rig, but the mainsail is proportionally larger and the jib smaller, for ease of handling and maximum power.
sentences.cn: 这仍然是一个百慕大帆，但主帆成比例地变大了，而前帆则相应变小，以便于操纵并获得最大动力。

sentences.en: To divide and distribute proportionally; apportion.
sentences.cn: 分配,配给按比例分割并分配; 分摊.

sentences.en: Ulster people spend more proportionally on clothes, food and motoring than other Britons.
sentences.cn: 阿尔斯特人花在服装 、 食品、驾车旅游方面的钱,其比例比其它地方的英国人都高.

sentences.en: You have proportionally more fat on your thighs and hips than anywhere else on your body.
sentences.cn: 相应地，你的大腿和臀部的脂肪比身体其他部位要多。

sentences.en: You have two ears and one mouth. Use proportionally.
sentences.cn: 你有两只耳朵和一张嘴, 所以要听两句说一句.

words.tran_cn: 成比例的；相称的；均衡的
比例的，成比例的；相称的，均衡的
成比例的；相称的；适当的
成比例地；相称地，适当地

trans.tran_cn: 按比例地，相配合地，适当地
